basic.description: This course provides an overview of advanced topics in computer design with a quantitative perspective. Topics include: instruction set design, pipelining, instruction-level parallelism, memory-hierarchy design, storage systems, and multiprocessors.
basic.subject: ELEC
basic.title: Computer System Architecture

extra.enrollment_requirement: Exclusion: CISC441.  Prerequisite of (ELEC371 and CISC231) or (ELEC371 and ELEC274) and registration in a BSCE Academic Program or an SODE-P-BCH Academic Plan.
